titleHead: [CY] Double check MRN date - Appeal a benefit decision - GOV.UK
title: [CY] Double check the date you entered
subtitle: [CY] Your appeal may be late. Just check you entered the date from the top right of your Mandatory Reconsideration Notice.
question: [CY] Did you enter the date from the top right of your MRN?

checkedMRN.yes: [CY] Yes, I entered the date from the top right of my MRN
checkedMRN.no: [CY] No, I entered a different date

error.required: [CY] You have not answered the question. Select either yes or no
